description:
cgo: Emitting correct line number annotations by introducing a new Writer implementation (lineAdjuster) as a decorator sitting between go/printer.Fprint and the .go file. Every line of generated code will be passed through an instance of lineAdjuster and then output to the .cgo1.go file. lineAdjuster will prpperly emit line number annotations in the middle of the .cgo1.go file.
Fixes issue 1047 2697
